author: wsjcom
title: Court-Ordered Rehab Is Costly, Ineffective
text:
“Rehab Costs Add to Anguish of Addiction” (page one, March 9) makes very clear the high cost of rehab and abysmal results that can be expected.
By now it is clear, to anyone who wishes to understand the science, that addiction is a chronic disease of the brain, the same way diabetes is a chronic disease of the endocrine system. In treating diabetes, we employ an arsenal of medications to help patients control blood sugar.
